BundleDropModule.name: BundleDropModule
BundleDropModule.summary: Setup a collection of NFTs with a customizable number of each NFT that are minted as users claim them.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets NFT balance (number of a specific NFT in this module owned by the wallet).

methods.name: claimTo
methods.remarks: Let the a specified wallet claim NFTs.
methods.signature: claimTo(tokenId: BigNumberish, quantity: BigNumberish, addressToClaim: string, proofs?: BytesLike[]): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;

methods.name: createBatch
methods.remarks: Create and mint NFTs.

methods.name: getAll
methods.remarks: Get data associated with NFTs in this module.

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer an NFT from the connected wallet to another wallet.
methods.signature: transfer(to: string, tokenId: BigNumberish, amount: BigNumberish, data?: BytesLike): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;

BundleDropModule.signature: export declare class BundleDropModule extends ModuleWithRoles<BundleDrop> implements ITransferable

BundleModule.name: BundleModule
BundleModule.summary: Create a collection of NFTs that lets you optionally mint multiple copies of each NFT.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets NFT balance (number of a specific NFT in this module owned by the wallet).

methods.name: createAndMint
methods.remarks: Create and mint NFTs.

methods.name: createAndMintBatch
methods.remarks: Create and mint many different NFTs.

methods.name: getAll
methods.remarks: Get data associated with NFTs in this module.

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer an NFT from the connected wallet to another wallet.
methods.signature: transfer(to: string, tokenId: string, amount: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;

methods.name: transferBatchFrom
methods.remarks: Transfer NFTs from the one wallet to another.

BundleModule.signature: export declare class BundleModule extends ModuleWithRoles<NFTBundleContract> implements ITransferable

DropModule.name: DropModule
DropModule.summary: Setup a collection of one-of-one NFTs that are minted as users claim them.
DropModule.remarks: The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `DropModule` class.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets NFT balance (number of NFTs in this module owned by the wallet).

methods.name: canClaim
methods.remarks: Check if the drop can currently be claimed.

methods.name: claimTo
methods.remarks: Let the a specified wallet claim NFTs.
methods.signature: claimTo(quantity: BigNumberish, addressToClaim: string, proofs?: BytesLike[]): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;

methods.name: getAll
methods.remarks: Get all the data associated with every NFT in this module.

examples.javascript:
const nfts = await module.getAll();
console.log(nfts);

methods.name: getOwned
methods.remarks: Get all the data associated with the NFTs owned by a specific wallet.

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer an NFT from the connected wallet to another wallet.

DropModule.signature: export declare class DropModule extends ModuleWithRoles<DropV2> implements ITransferable

MarketplaceModule.name: MarketplaceModule
MarketplaceModule.summary: Create your own whitelabel marketplace that enables users to buy and sell any digital assets.

methods.name: buyoutAuctionListing
methods.remarks: Buy a specific direct listing from the marketplace.

methods.name: buyoutDirectListing
methods.remarks: Buy a specific direct listing from the marketplace.

methods.name: cancelAuctionListing
methods.remarks: Cancel an auction listing on the marketplace

methods.name: cancelDirectListing
methods.remarks: Cancel a direct listing on the marketplace

methods.name: createAuctionListing
methods.remarks: Create a new auction where people can bid on an asset.

methods.name: createDirectListing
methods.remarks: Create a new listing on the marketplace where people can buy an asset directly.

methods.name: getAllListings
methods.remarks: Get all listings in the marketplace.

methods.name: makeAuctionListingBid
methods.remarks: Make a bid on an auction listings

PackModule.name: PackModule
PackModule.summary: Create lootboxes of NFTs with rarity based open mechanics.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets pack balance (number of a specific packs in this module owned by the wallet).

methods.name: create
methods.remarks: Create a new pack with its own rewards.

methods.name: getAll
methods.remarks: Get data associated with every pack in this module.

examples.javascript:
const packs = await module.getAll();
console.log(packs);

methods.name: open
methods.remarks: Open a pack to burn it and obtain the reward asset inside.

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer an NFT from the connected wallet to another wallet.
methods.signature: transfer(to: string, tokenId: string, amount: BigNumber): Promise<void>;

SplitsModule.name: SplitsModule
SplitsModule.summary: Create custom royalty splits to distribute funds.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get the amount of funds in the native currency held by the module thats owed to a specific recipient.

methods.name: balanceOfToken
methods.remarks: Get the amount of funds in the non-native tokens held by the module thats owed to a specific recipient.

methods.name: distribute
methods.remarks: Distribute funds held by the contract in the native currency to all recipients.

examples.javascript: await module.distribute();

methods.name: distributeToken
methods.remarks: Distribute funds held by the contract in the native currency to all recipients.

methods.name: getAllRecipients
methods.remarks: Get the data about the shares of every split recipient on the module

examples.javascript:
const recipients = await module.getAllRecepients();
console.log(recipients);

methods.name: withdraw
methods.remarks: Withdraw due funds held by the contract in the native currency to a specific recipient.

methods.name: withdrawToken
methods.remarks: Withdraw due funds held by the contract in non-native tokens to a specific recipient.

SplitsModule.signature: export declare class SplitsModule extends Module<Royalty> implements ISplitsModule

TokenModule.name: TokenModule
TokenModule.summary: Create a standard crypto token or crypto currency.

methods.name: allowanceOf
methods.remarks: Get the allowance of one wallet over another's funds - the allowance of a different address for a token is the amount of tokens that the wallet is allowed to spend on behalf of the connected wallet.

methods.name: balanceOf
methods.remarks: Get a wallets token balance.

methods.name: burn
methods.remarks: Burn tokens held by the connected wallet

methods.name: mintBatchTo
methods.remarks: Mint tokens to many different wallets

methods.name: mintTo
methods.remarks: Mint tokens to a specified address

methods.name: transfer
methods.remarks: Transfer tokens from the connected wallet to another wallet.

methods.name: transferFrom
methods.remarks: Transfer tokens from one wallet to another
methods.signature: transferFrom(from: string, to: string, amount: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionReceipt>;
